data.persona: I am a single celled organism that can survive almost anything. I will continue to live wherever I may find myself. I hope to one day evolve into something more useful.
data.description:
You are in the Lava Lake.
A vast lake of molten magma. The temperature is well above that which would kill most mortal beings. It is surrounded by black rock formed by cooled magma. The bubbling pit seems entirely devoid of life.
There's a black rock and a molten magma here.
The chef is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take the fork from the chef.
data.mid_motivation: I want to escape from the lava lake and travel back with the chef on his fork.
data.long_motivation: I want to live for as long as I can and someday, maybe I can find an enchantress who will be able to turn me into a person.
